info.description: How well do you know the "rules" of Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs? Take this quiz to find out! Fill in the blank for the missing word in the rule.
info.name: "NCIS": Gibbs' Rules Test | NCIS
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Rule #23: Never mess with a marine's _________.

response.info: Gibbs quotes this rule on numerous occasions when people, particularly McGee, bump into him and spill his coffee. By the way, Gibbs drinks his coffee black and strong. Don't even try to give him chicory, he has quite the palate for coffee!

questions.text: Rule #1: Never let _______ stay together.

response.info: Gibbs never allows suspects stay in proximity to one another. Being together allows suspects time to collaborate and agree on a set story to give to the investigators.

questions.text: Rule #ll: When the job is done, ____ away.
Rule #3: Never be un__________.

response.info: Unless they are undercover, Gibbs does expect his agents to be armed, but he has never explicitly mentioned this as one of his rules. He never wants them to be unreachable, mainly because it can be a safety issue for them. If they get into trouble, Gibbs wants to be able to hear from them or at least track them.

questions.text: Rule #9: Never go anywhere without a ________.

response.info: This is a great rule. The team members have used those knives many times for things such as: diffusing bombs, removing bullets from objects at crime scenes, breaking out of rooms, opening packages, and opening sealed evidence bags.

questions.text: Rule #2: Always wear _______ at a crime scene.

response.info: This is an obvious rule. Agents wear gloves at crime scenes in order to prevent any potential evidence from being contaminated. On several episodes, local LEOs contaminated the crime scene before Gibbs and his team arrives. As a result, everyone had to be fingerprinted in order to rule out their fingerprints from those of potential suspects.

questions.text: Rule #8: Never take anything ___________.

response.info: He also doesn't take his team for granted. He appreciates all of them for their talents and for what they bring to the team, even if he never verbally states it.

questions.text: Rule #38: Your case, your ______.
Rule #13: Never, ever involve __________.

response.info: Gibbs first mentions this rule in the season six episode "Collateral Damage". It's likely that Gibbs acquired part of his dislike for lawyers during his three divorces. Just as a note, he particularly seems to dislike JAG lawyer Commander Faith Coleman who appears in several episodes.

questions.text: Rule #6: Never say you're ________, it's a sign of weakness.

response.info: Gibbs considers saying you're sorry to be a sign of weakness. After one if his team members screws up, Gibbs prefers that they simply tell him that it won't happen again. He has, however, apologized a couple of times on the show; once to Kate for being late to her funeral and once to Ducky after coming out of retirement. Even though Gibbs mentions this rule very often in the series, he never mentions which number corresponds to this rule.

info.description: Abby has some of the best lines on "NCIS". How well do you remember them?
info.name: "NCIS":  "Abby-isms" Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: When Abby finds something to be not quite right, what does she say it is?

response.info: Hinky seems to be Abby's favorite word to describe something that is weird, unexpected, or even just kind of cool. She's even gotten the rest of the team to occasionally use the word!

questions.text: Abby: "Yes sir".

response.info: Abby doesn't seem to understand Gibbs' dislike of being called sir. She will intentionally call him sir just to get the above response. After getting the response, she gets a smirk out of him by calling him "ma'am" instead of "Gibbs" or "Boss". You have to love Abby; she is the only person who could get away with doing this to Jethro.

questions.text: Abby: "Gibbs, you scared me".
Gibbs: "Any chance we could read the call log?"

response.info: Poor Abby is constantly being asked to retrieve data off of electronics that are flooded, smashed, burned, blown up, or in some other way, utterly destroyed. At least this time she gets a smirk out of Gibbs while delivering the bad news.

questions.text: Abby: "You're like a piercing, Tony, it takes a while for the ________ to stop and the skin to grow back".

response.info: In this quote, Tony is asking Abby why she didn't take to him as fast as she did Kate. After her response he admitted that her answer was more than he wanted to know.

questions.text: Abby: (To McGee regarding his new crazy girlfriend) "Love is never having to read her her _________  __________."

response.info: This quote is from the season 5 episode "Designated Targets". In this episode, McGee's new girlfriend is maxing out his credit cards.

questions.text: Abby: [about a suspect] "This guy is cleaner than cleaner, whiter than white. If you put him in a line up with ______ , ______ is going to jail". Hint: both blanks are the same word.

response.info: This quote is from the season 2 episode "Forced Entry". Abby was being quite adamant that this suspect was innocent!

questions.text: Abby: "The bullet's entry angle into the side of the door is as obvious as Anna Nicole's ____________".
Abby: "You're not listening to a word I'm saying. I'm pregnant, McGee. Twins. Haven't told the father yet. It's ________".

response.info: As she said this, DiNozzo walks in. After some further explanations on Abby's part, DiNozzo slaps McGee on the back of the head to get his attention back on Abby.

questions.text: Abby: "What's the matter, Chip? Don't like watchin' porn with me"?

response.info: This quote is from the season 3 episode "The Voyeur's Web". One of the first jobs of Chip, Abby's new assistant, is to watch hours and hours of adult webcasts. Seems to be an awkward way to start a new job.

info.description: Fearless leader Gibbs has some pretty funny lines. Do you remember them? Fill in the blank to finish Gibbs' line from the show. Good luck!
info.name: "NCIS": Gibbs-isms Season 1 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Gibbs: "You never work the system when you can work the ________".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hung Out to Dry". Gibbs and Kate are trying to find a way to gain access to the Armed Forces DNA registry. After unsuccessfully trying to coerce a JAG lawyer into giving them access, they guilt him into giving them a search warrant that, in Abby's terms, is a little hinky.

questions.text: Captain Faul: "You JAG or NCIS"?

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Hung Out to Dry". People that work in law enforcement don't always like lawyers, and Gibbs is no exception. He takes offense that the Captain is implying that he might look like a lawyer.

questions.text: Fuller: "Your bluff worked. Trujillo wants to talk. He really believed you'd ship him off to Gitmo".

answers.text: to call their's before they call your's.
answers.value: to call their's before they call your's.

answers.text: to act like you mean it
answers.value: to act like you mean it

questions.text: Tony: "Radar Intercept Officer. Also called a GIB's, one B. Stands for Guy In Back".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Curse". In this episode, they find a murdered serviceman in the wing tank of a Tomcat that was found in the woods. As they were the discussing the Tomcat aircraft, Tony mentions that it's a two person aircraft. This quote soon follows.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Don't '_____' me. I work for a living".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Curse". In the military it is tradition that enlisted men and NCO's be called by their rank, and not by "sir" or "ma'am". In fact, it is often considered an insult to call enlisted men and NCO's "sir" or "ma'am". The soldiers that are on the front lines are made up mostly of enlisted personnel. Therefore, the pun that enlisted men are the ones that work for a living has been a long established one.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Whale huggers"?

response.info: After the crew puts the body in the freezer to preserve it, the canister is triggered by the cold to release the gas. In order to get the body off the ship before the gas leaks out, Gibbs and the COB launched the body out of a torpedo tube.

questions.text: Kate: "Do people react that way because we're NCIS, or do you just have that effect on them"?

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Sub Rosa". This quote occurred after Gibbs and the COB got into it about the safety of the boat.

questions.text: Gibbs: "See if you can brand the cologne".
Gibbs: "Why is it that women always want to fix what doesn't need fixing"?

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Minimum Security". This is an odd quote. Be aware that this is a season one episode. Several times in this season we see and hear Gibbs mention scotch. During future seasons, Gibbs' drink of choice is bourbon.

questions.text: Kate: "You know I bet this is why number two came after you with a nine iron, isn't it? You just refused to sit down and talk things through".

response.info: This is from the episode "Eye Spy". Based on Gibbs' character, he would never strike a woman. He does, however, seem to marry women that like to beat him. As mentioned above, wife number two hit him with a seven iron. In a later episode, it is mentioned that a different wife hit him with a baseball bat.

info.description: Ready for some more funny lines from the great Leroy Jethro Gibbs? Get ready! Go!
info.name: "NCIS" Gibbs-isms Season 3 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: (Tony holds up the nightgown he got for his girlfriend to show Ziva)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Voyeur's Web". Gibbs always seems to walk in at just the right moment!

questions.text: Gibbs: "Butt kissing on the hill is a skill." (first word edited)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Frame Up". Jenny and Jethro seem to have a love/hate relationship. At times they seem like an old married couple. Both have the ability to think quickly to deliver the snappy come back line.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Can somebody tell me what's going on here? First, Abby's lab nerd frames DiNozzo for murder, and then McGee kills a cop. Did somebody _______________?!"

answers.text: get crossed by a black cat
answers.value: get crossed by a black cat

questions.text: Gibbs: "Tony, Ziva, what happened back there with that bomb...I just want you to know..."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Light Sleeper". Gibbs hates when his team members disobey an order, even when their disobedience allows them to disarm a bomb and save the day.

questions.text: Gibbs: "McGee, you know, __________ doesn't exist solely to piss me off... sometimes, they can actually be useful."

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Light Sleeper". Gibbs has a way of manipulating the FBI into occasionally doing his dirty work for them. His friendship with FBI agent Fornell aids in this ability.

questions.text: Abby: "I found calcium which is present in human bones, but no phosphorus."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Family Secret". This quote is another perfect example of interesting relationship between Gibbs and Abby. It seems to be a father/daughter relationship, but there are so many sexual innuendos between these two that it is sometimes hard to describe their relationship.

questions.text: (Gibbs is visiting Abby's stalker ex-boyfriend)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Bloodbath". Abby told Gibbs that she filed a restraining order against Michael instead of telling him because she wanted him restrained, not beaten to a pulp with a baseball bat. Abby is very aware of the lengths that Gibbs will go to to protect her.

questions.text: Gibbs: "You were a darn good agent, especially __________. [Nods]

answers.text: when it comes to dealing with politics
answers.value: when it comes to dealing with politics

questions.text: Jenny: "This the same boat you were building six years ago?"

answers.text: Gave her to my God Daughter
answers.value: Gave her to my God Daughter

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Kill Ari, Part 1". He named this boat "Diane", after one of his ex-wives. Gibbs did, in the future, give a boat to his God daughter. That boat was named "Kelly".

questions.text: Tony: "What do I do if I see Ari?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Kill Ari, Part 2". I would bet that Gibbs wanted Ari dead almost as much as he wanted to kill the drug dealer that had his wife and daughter murdered.

info.description: Here they are...more funny quotes from America's favorite goth!
info.name: "NCIS": Abby-isms Season 3 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Abby: "One of the Director's new admin weenies brought me this last night. It's the NCIS dress code. She said I was in violation."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Silver War". Abby calls traditional work clothes "monkey suits". Abby would simply not be Abby with out her goth clothes.

questions.text: Abby: (about Tony) "He always gives new people grief. He learned that from _______."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Under Covers". In this episode Tony and Ziva go undercover as a married couple. I hope you didn't say Vance. He does like to give people, especially Jethro, grief; Vance was not the Director of NCIS in season 3.

questions.text: Abby: (raises hands as if in prayer) "For a second, I lost my faith in... But now I know, that forensics was just testing me. And I will rise up, and I will find the man that did this to Tony, and I will ________ him!"
McGee: "You know, I read a statistic that says you're more likely to be struck by lightning than attacked by a shark."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Model Behavior". Abby's comeback to this comment left McGee temporarily speechless. Leave it to Abby to have a quirky, yet rational come back.

questions.text: (talking about the worst ways to die)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Model Behavior". Being a goth, Abby is fascinated by death, so she's put some thought into her three worst ways to die.

questions.text: (Abby hands Gibbs a cup of coffee.)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Light Sleeper". None of the team members like going to the sensitivity classes. The only thing they hate more are the sexual harassment classes.

questions.text: Palmer: (as he was cutting tissue samples from Wayne's head for Abby-grinning)"So... dark meat or white?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Head Case". Palmer is none for sometimes making inappropriate comments regarding a dead body. Typically, it is Ducky that fusses at him. This time, however, Abby got a turn.

questions.text: Abby: "____________ know how you feel about coincidences, Gibbs."
Abby: "It's a ladybug toothbrush McGee! That's for cute girls named Gina Marie who bake cookies and wear _______. Not for quasi-manly federal agents who carry a gun."

response.info: After looking for hers, Abby finds a ladybug toothbrush that is obviously not hers. The above quote is her response.

questions.text: Abby (as McGee bends to try to see the license plate of the van): "It's not a _______, McGee... you can't look up it to see what you want."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Kill Ari, Part 2". McGee and Abby are looking at a picture of a van, trying to read the license plate number. McGee bends almost upside down to look at the picture of the van. Abby is quick to remind him that doing that will not make the picture any more visible.

info.description: This quiz is probably kind of hard if you aren't an "NCIS" fanatic. These are quotes from all three seasons so be prepared. I'll give the quote and you tell me what episode it is from.
info.name: "NCIS": What Episode is This From? Quiz
info.author: navy4nsiks

questions.text: Abby: "That's for cute girls named Gina Marie that bake cookies and wear J. Lo Glow."

response.info: In "Bloodbath," Abby says this in reply to McGee telling her that her toothbrush is in his bathroom. After going to get it, Abby comes back out holding a ladybug toothbrush, insisting to McGee... that is it definitely not hers.

questions.text: Dennis (guest-star): "NCIS anything like 'CSI'?"

response.info: In "Yankee White," Tony is talking to a guy named Dennis, telling him that he is from NCIS. Of course, Dennis says, "NCIS anything like 'CSI?'"

questions.text: Kate: "I had to wear a skirt today."
Ari: "Are you any good with this gun Caitlin?"

response.info: In "Bete Noire," Ari, the terrorist, is holding Kate, Ducky and Gerald hostage down in autopsy. Kate, being an agent, carries a gun and Ari has taken it. Kate's reply to Ari is, "I'm about to right now."

questions.text: Kate: "Gibbs, what did Ducky look like when he was younger?"

response.info: In "The Meat Puzzle," when Kate asks Gibbs what Ducky looked like when he was younger, Gibbs replies "Illya Kuryakin." Illya Kuryakin is the character that David McCallum (Ducky) played on "The Man From U.N.C.L.E." in the 1960s.

questions.text: Tony: "See anyone you know, sweet cheeks?"

response.info: In "Under Covers," Tony and Ziva go under cover as a married couple. At 'dinner' one night, they are searching for the suspect when Tony asks if she has seen anyone yet.

questions.text: McGee: "Ah, morning, Agent Todd."

response.info: In "See No Evil," McGee is under Kate's desk fixing her computer. She sits down, not knowing he is under there. When she does sit down, she realizes McGee is there and immediately jumps up. McGee can now see up her skirt and she isn't very happy.

questions.text: Gibbs: "It was suicide by cop Kate. Get over it."
Kate: "Todd on repel."

response.info: In "A Weak Link," Kate says she wishes that she had a better understanding of repelling. So to help her understand, she repels with Tony below her and Gibbs by her side.

questions.text: Abby: "Hey. I had a weird dream about Tony last night."

response.info: In "Twilight," Abby's dream is actually the end of this very episode. The blood she was referring to on Tony's face was Kate's. In reply to Abby's nightmare, Kate says, "It's okay. It's just a bete noire." The episode "Bete Noire" is also the first time we see Kate's killer, Ari.

info.description: Here are some more of the funny quotes from everyone's favorite goth forensic scientist!
info.name: "NCIS" Abby-isms Season 2 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Abby: "Believe it or not, Gibbs, not all computer problems can be solved by _____________."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "See No Evil". Gibbs has a knack for destroying cell phones. If one malfunctions, he either smacks it or bangs it on his desk. After destroying it, he just tosses it to McGee and tells him to reboot it. Unknown to Gibbs, McGee simply puts the Sim card in a new phone and tosses the old phone in the trash can.

questions.text: Abby: "You think he did it?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Forced Entry". In this episode, a woman shoots and almost kills a man that broke into her house and tried to rape her. The man swears that it was all part of a game, and Gibbs and the team have to determine the truth.

questions.text: Abby: "No one gets everything right the first time, McGee. Except ________."
Abby: "I am one of the few people in the world who can murder you and ________________________."

answers.text: not get in trouble with Gibbs
answers.value: not get in trouble with Gibbs

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Meat Puzzle". Abby likes to use this as a threat, but I can't imagine her ever killing anyone. She gets mad at scientists that kill bunny rabbits for research. How could she ever do it to a person! Something tells me that Ducky and Gibbs would also be able to kill and leave no evidence behind.

questions.text: Abby: "Somebody did a ___________ on Sgt. Moore's head, Gibbs."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Caught On Tape". Gibbs should be sympathetic to Sgt. Moore. One of Gibbs ex-wives once whacked him with a baseball bat. He apparently likes the feisty ones.

questions.text: Gibbs: "I thought these tests were fast."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "SWAK". Gibbs is anxious to get the test results back from Abby. She is determining what the contagion is that might be affecting Tony.

questions.text: Abby: "Hey. I had a weird dream about Tony last night."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Twilight". Apparently Kate and Abby have a pretty close friendship. They go to spas together, discuss dreams and fantasies, and share the same quirky personality. I wonder if you'd ever see Gibbs and Mike Franks sharing a beer and talking about what their dreams mean? No, I doubt it.

questions.text: Abby: "You're so right Gibbs! I have this friend who is a transvestite and her lips could out-SWAK _____________. Remember McGee, you met her at my birthday party?"
Tony: "Massages?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hometown Hero". Had he not been distracted by a phone call, I think Tony would have like the visual of Kate and Abby getting massages.

questions.text: Abby: "You may be smart, but my geek _________!"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Red Cell". Did you know that, as of March 2009, Pauly Perrette is 40 years old? She makes 40 look great!

info.description: He's back. More of the best lines from Tony DiNozzo!
info.name: "NCIS" DiNozzo-isms Season 3 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Tony: "We should take you to see the doctor, Sweet Cheeks."

response.info: This quote is from the "Under Covers". In this episode, Tony and Ziva are undercover as a married couple. As a result, they share a bed together at night. From the lines given after the above quote, both of them snore. Ziva, however, seems to be the louder of the two.

questions.text: Tony: "You... ta.. talked to the..."

response.info: The above quote was from the scene in which Ziva tricked Tony into mentioning why they wanted to talk to him.

questions.text: Tony: "I didn't make a single broadcast!"
(Ziva lands on top of Tony to protect him from a ricocheting bullet.)

response.info: After about two impacts, it will merely sting like a paintball. Either way, don't try it at home.

questions.text: Tony: "Friction burns?" (on Ziva's knees)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Boxed In". As usual, Tony is always curious about everybody else's love life. He hounds Ziva for the entire episode about why she has friction burns on her knees.

questions.text: Abby: "Yes, railroad tracks would be an obvious choice. But there isn't a 2nd thunk or a thack not even a thonk on the track."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Deception". Abby was in a very playful mood and decided to rhyme her findings to Tony. Dr. Dre has been known to write a rhyme or two, but he doesn't typically refer to forensic evidence!

questions.text: Tony: "Well, I like, think you're, like, totally, like, lying, like. You wanna know why?"

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Deception". Many interrogations have shown that Gibbs is wonderful with kids. He gets information out of them, but never scares or intimidates them. Tony, however, is a different story. When the first attempt fails, he resorts to intimidation. It worked, and the kid kind of deserved it, so kudos to Tony.

questions.text: Tony: "What, are you an expert on suspect interviews now?"
Ziva: "I said no, I don't want him to think I'm sleazy."

response.info: It's a good thing she did, he turns out to be the serial killer!

questions.text: (Tony talks with Stevenson in the MTAC-Room)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hiatus Part 1". In this episode, Tony has the lead after an explosion puts Gibbs in a coma. In this quote, Tony means to say that the probability of an infiltration is small; how many men get the chance to be on the arm of Jessica Alba? As a matter of fact, in the early 2000's, Michael Weatherly was engaged to Jessica Alba. I wonder if the writers had a different female in the script and Michael changed it to Jessica for the sake of a good inside joke?

info.description: We have all heard "Ziva-isms" during the series, but have you noticed the "DiNozzo-isms"?
info.name: "NCIS": DiNozzo-isms Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: According to Tony, you should "never date a woman that ______ more than you do".

response.info: This "DiNozzo-ism" is actually said by McGee after Tony asks him about one of his dating rules.

questions.text: Tony: "That's the wacky nature of these cases. They're sort of like cheap ________. You think they're closed and then BAM! You hit a curb, lose a wheel and they open up all over again."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Agent Afloat" when Tony is talking to the Doctor aboard the USS Seahawk about the sailor that supposedly jumped overboard.

questions.text: Tony to McGee:  "I am the ______
Tony to Ziva: "I'm a white male between the ages of 18 and 49 with a gun. I AM the _________

answers.hint: (2 words: 8 letters starts with "A" , 5 letters starts with "D")

response.info: This is from the season 7 episode "Outlaws and In-Laws". To become a Special Agent, Ziva has to become a US citizen. After a comment from Tony, Ziva asks him what he knows about the American Dream. This quote was his reply.

questions.text: Tony to McGee: "That's like a yoga position. Upside down _______".

response.info: This quote is from the season 7 episode "The Inside Man".

questions.text: Tony, pretending to be a news anchor: "In a tragic story of obsessive hobbying turned deadly, an NCIS Agent was discovered in his basement crushed between a large, homemade boat and an even larger bottle of ________".

response.info: This is from the season 6 episode called "Dead Reckoning". Tony finishes his crack at Gibbs by adding, "film at eleven".

questions.text: Tony to McGee (talking about Ziva): "Don't worry McScout, we got our Mossad ______ dog. Bark once for yes".

response.info: This quote is from the season 6 episode "Dagger". After this comment, Ziva growls back at Tony.

questions.text: Gibbs: "You sound tired, DiNozzo".
Ziva: "I drove Tony. You could have slept all night if you wanted".

response.info: This is from the season 5 episode "Lost & Found". After Tony's complaint, she reminds him that they made good time.

questions.text: TSA Agent in airport: "NCIS. Is that anything like CSI?"

response.info: This quote is from the series premier episode "Yankee White". It is a constant source of annoyance to Tony that most people have never heard of "NCIS", let alone what it stands for or what it does.

info.description: Ready for some more of those funny sayings from our favorite quirky medical examiner? Here they come!
info.name: "NCIS" Ducky-isms Season 3 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Ducky: "Do you know the difference between good and bad __________ Tony?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Mind Games". Ducky has hinting about Tony's horrible eating habits. In earlier seasons, Kate used to do the same thing.

questions.text: Ducky: "How do you tell a woman you have no mental recollection of her what-so-ever?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Silver War". The scientist that was studying the supposed civil war body apparently met Ducky years earlier at a conference. She implied that they had been quite friendly. Ducky, however, has no memory of ever meeting her. A classic DiNozzo situation.

questions.text: Ducky: "I hope you brought more appropriate footwear, Mr. Palmer. The journey to our petty officer seems rather challenging."
Ducky: "Though it may be common knowledge that I talk to my patients, unfortunately to date, none of them have ever ______________."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Under Covers". In this episode, Ziva and Tony go undercover as a married couple. The couple they are impersonating, are laying on Ducky's autopsy tables. Gibbs is asking Ducky for details about the couple that could help Tony and Ziva better pass for them.

questions.text: Ducky: "I suggest a couple of aspirin."

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Under Covers". Towards the end of the episode, Tony and Ziva's cover is blown and they end up getting in a little scuffle; hence the cut on Tony's eye.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Accidental overdose, Duck?"

response.info: The manager attempts to poison the soldier by spiking his chewing tobacco with PCP. By accident, the model chews the tobacco and dies as a result of an overdose on PCP.

questions.text: Ducky: "Yes, I once performed an autopsy on a man who drowned in his ___________. Yes, apparently, he couldn't remove the drain plug and attempted to use his teeth."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Iced". Ducky has done some weird autopsies in his day; bodies in barrels of hydrochloric acid, bodies that have been smoked in chimneys, bodies that have been cut up into tons of pieces, bodies that were embalmed while still alive, bodies that had been crucified, etc. How do the writers come up with some of this stuff?

questions.text: Ducky: "I've been traveling to crime scenes for a great many years, but I can say with complete confidence this is the ___________ commute I have ever had."
Ducky: "I sat on a bomb once. No, twice. The first time I was young, the second time I was __________."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hiatus, Part 1". In this episode, Gibbs is knocked unconscious by an explosion and ends up in a coma. As it turns out, the person in the room with Gibbs when the bomb goes off was sitting on it. He apparently didn't know it was under him.

questions.text: Season 3 was lacking in the funny Ducky-isms department, so here's a random question: As well as doing a physical autopsy on a dead person, what other kind of autopsy can Ducky do on a dead body? (He can also do a variation on living people too!)

response.info: Ducky is well known for doing psychological autopsies as well as standard autopsies. During seasons one and two, the character Kate was trained in psychological profiling. When that character was killed off, the character of Ducky inherited the job of occasionally providing those types of details to Jethro.

info.description: I've got some more Gibbs-isms for you! Fill in the blank to finish the quote!
info.name: "NCIS": Gibbs-isms Season 2 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Tony: "Do you believe in Karma Boss"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Lt. Jane Doe". From this quote, Jethro is eluding to the idea that his three ex-wives were punishment for something wrong he has done.

questions.text: Gibbs: "I've seen better pictures of __________."

response.info: After asking Abby to clean up and enhance that image, Gibbs tells her that he's seen better pictures of Sasquatch.

questions.text: Kate: "This house is sorta how I always pictured Tony's place".
Gibbs: "You got him"?

response.info: This is from the episode "Chained". This is one of the many quotes that makes you wonder about the relationship between Gibbs and Abby. It comes across as a father-daughter relationship, but every so often you get a hint of romantic chemistry.

questions.text: Ducky: "Do you suspect foul play"?

response.info: This is from the episode "Black Water". Ducky took a stab at Jethro and his three divorces. Typically it's Tony that makes this type of comment.

questions.text: Gibbs: "I want you to stick to him..."

response.info: This is from the episode "The Meat Puzzle". Gibbs makes it very clear to Kate that this person better not elude her. You'd think Gibbs would have learned to make those ex-wives sign a pre-nup!

questions.text: Abby: "You're getting sneakier the older you get".

response.info: This is from the episode "An Eye For An Eye". When Jethro takes the elevator up to Abby's lab, she can hear him coming by the ding of the elevator. When Jethro decided to take the stairs, he was able to sneak up on Abby.

questions.text: Witten: "I have a degree in Clinical Psychology. Do you have any expertise in the area, Agent Gibbs"?
Kate: "I hate to say it but that was actually smart, Tony"

response.info: This is from the episode "Red Cell". This quote is one of the few times that Kate gives DiNozzo a compliment, even if it was a left handed one.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Requisition replacement cell phones and weapons for my team. Go!"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "SWAK". After Tony is exposed to the plague, the team was unable to use anything from the office in case of contamination. Gibbs asks Palmer to get new phones and guns so they can begin their investigation. The response he got is typical coming from Palmer. He always seems terribly intimidated by Gibbs.

info.description: This is a quiz on the quotes from season one and two of the TV show "NCIS". Just pick the episode that the quote was from or the person that said it. Enjoy!
info.name: "NCIS"  - Quotes Trivia Quiz
info.author: dancing1101

questions.text: Gibbs: "Rule Number Three; Don't believe what you're told. Always double check."

response.info: Rule number nine: "Always carry a knife."

questions.text: "Oh, by the the way... I took your advice... and went with mom..."

response.info: McGee says this to Tony in response to something he says earlier in the episode. McGee was asking about Abby and when Tony says that Abby is not McGee's type. Tony says to McGee "Have you ever had the slightest urge to tattoo your buttocks, McGee?" so McGee decides to "take his advice" by getting a tattoo.

questions.text: Kate: "Todd on repel."
Gibbs: "What did the urine tell you Abby?"

response.info: In this episode, a woman across the street witness a murder but there is no evidence that it has happened. McGee is sent to the crime scene and when he tells the rest of the team to come to check it out, he is counting on them to find something. They end up finding urine on the floor and, of course, Abby has to analyze it, thus the quote.

questions.text: "Hey, DiNozzo, kinda reminds me of your apartment. 'Cept for that minty fresh urine smell."

response.info: In "One Shot, One Kill" they were investigating a sniper that had shot a Gunnery Sergeant to get revenge. Gibbs and Kate dress up as marines.

questions.text: "Realizing how sad this sounds, you're the closest thing I have to a friend, Gibbs."

response.info: Fornell is turning to Gibbs for help because he is believed to have killed another FBI agent. He is taken to prison and Gibbs has to prove his innocence which involves dealing with the mafia. In the end, Agent Charles is the one who did it.

questions.text: Gibbs: "I want you to stick to him..."

response.info: Kate has to protect Ducky because they believed that he was next in a series of murders involving a case he testified against. Ducky still gets captured because Kate was looking after Ducky's mother who was outside at the time. The team comes to the rescue just in time.

questions.text: Tony: "Hey Kate, did you tell Brad about that wet t-shirt contest you won?"
"You have a stuffed animal that farts?"

response.info: Tony comes into Abby's lab to lie down because he is still getting over the plague and nearly just got exploded. Abby gives him her stuffed hippo named Bert to lie on. When Bert gets squeezed, it makes a farting noise.

questions.text: Tony: "We've been calling you for the last hour, Boss."

response.info: Ari Haswari comes back in this episode and plans to kill Gibbs. Gibbs and Ari meet up and Ari tries to kill him, but fails. They find out Ari's plan and go after him. In a mass shooting, Kate saves Gibbs' life by taking a bullet with her bulletproof vest. She stands up, then Ari shoots her in the head.

info.description: Ready for some more Tony? He has some great lines, but can you remember them?
info.name: "NCIS"  DiNozzo-isms : Season 2 Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Tony: "Question for you, Probie. 'Redbook?' Why?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Good Wives Club". In this episode, Tony gives McGee constant grief for admitting that he reads 'Redbook.' In return, McGee mans up and gives Tony some grief for being insensitive to women.

questions.text: Kate: (watching Gibbs interrogate) "What is Gibbs doing?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Vanished". Gibbs is known for his interrogation skills and for his ability to detect deception. Because of these skills, he can be very intimidating when he's interrogating a suspect. On the other hand, he can be incredibly gentle and comforting when dealing with a child.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Mrs. Mallard?"
Tony: "You're a Spike Steel fan aren't you, Probie?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Caught on Tape". Based on his character, it's surprising that McGee knows who Spike Steel is. This is a topic that Tony is probably much more familiar with!

questions.text: Tony: "I'm practicing, Kate."

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Caught On Tape". If Gibbs could sneak up on his sniper victims as well as he does him team members, then he must have had a great kill record. Tony constantly says something critical about Gibbs, only to turn around and find him standing directly behind him.

questions.text: Willie: "She's cute. Yeah, she's hot. I don't know about you but I sleep with a lot of women, so..."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Pop Life". At first, Tony tries to help Willie remember something about the woman he went to be with. Tony prompted him to try to remember something small, like a perfume. Willie recognizes Tony as a fellow player, and ends up remembering a tattoo on the girl that he went to bed with. Tony then shocks Willie with the above comment.

questions.text: Kate: "Gibbs would never walk in here and tells us how much he paid for his shirt."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Bikini Wax". Obviously thinking Gibbs was not around, Tony took the opportunity to take a stab at Gibbs' choice in clothing. As Tony and Kate get in the elevator, Gibbs joins them. When Tony asks Gibbs if he got around to looking over a case report that he turned in, Gibbs apologizes by saying he was too busy shopping a sale at Sears. Busted again!

questions.text: Tony: "There's definitely something wrong with this guy."
(Palmer massages Abby, Tony walks in and slaps him upside the head)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hometown Hero". Gibbs isn't the only person who's protective of Abby. McGee and Tony are also very protective of Abs.

questions.text: Tony: "This is serious."

response.info: This seemed to be working, but when he started mentioning the alternatives are just as bad.

info.description: I had fun, I hope you do too.
info.name: "NCIS" -  Who Said It? Trivia Quiz
info.author: Abby(Sam)

questions.text: "If you do that again...I will kick your..."

response.info: Tony is very sexist in his speech. Gibbs had had enough of these comments towards Kate and threatened him.

questions.text: "Hmm. Well I hate to break it to you Tony, but Gibbs can be wrong sometimes."

response.info: Tony did everything Gibbs said and told Kate that Gibbs is never wrong.  In one episode Kate told Tony the truth that Gibbs can be wrong.

questions.text: "Ahh! Gibbs! Didn't your Momma teach you not to sneak up on people?"
"Why do I feel like a high school principal?"

response.info: Gibbs says this after one of Kate and Tony's little fights.

questions.text: "You know Abby, sometimes the dead make more sense to me than the living."

response.info: In this episode, the plot got very complicated and Ducky and Abby couldn't make sense of it.  Ducky said this to Abby when he was totally exasperated.

questions.text: "For nobody leaving the building, there are a lot of people leaving the building."

response.info: This was when Ari was loose and the whole team was in danger. Kate had been killed by Ari.  Everyone was supposed to stay in the building, after Ari shot at Abby, she and McGee went to the Squad Room.

questions.text: "You, who won't share a Krispy Kreme doughnut, is going to give up a kidney?"

response.info: The director of critical issues from the sperm bank was trying to contact Tony.

questions.text: ___: "What are you thinking about Jethro?"
"You smell like wet dog."

response.info: Fornell said it to Gibbs before Kate's funeral.  It was raining and Gibbs sat on a bench after having put the wet dog under a gazebo.

questions.text: "What was that tip I picked up in Baltimore? Right on the tip... Oh yeah. Rapists are liars Kate."

response.info: Before Tony joined NCIS he was a cop in Baltimore.

info.description: Ready for some more DiNozzo quotes? Here they are. Go for it!
info.name: "NCIS" DiNozzo-isms Season 1 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Tony: "Five years with Gibbs? Amazed the guy didn't end up in a __________".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "High Seas". In this episode, the team helps an agent afloat solve a drug ring aboard a US Navy ship. Stan, the agent afloat, had previously worked for Gibbs.

questions.text: Tony: "Is that a new perfume, Abby?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Marine Down". What is it with these guys? Abby likes to smell like gunpowder, and Gibbs likes to smell like sawdust. I wonder if McGee likes to smell like his typewriter ribbons?

questions.text: Tony: "What good is it being an armed Federal agent if you can't __________?"
Tony: "You know if this works, Abs, you're a genius."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "One Shot, One Kill". Abby, much like the rest of the team, never miss an opportunity to take a stab at Tony and his playboy ways.

questions.text: Kate: "Do all Marines build boats?"

answers.text: the ones that have been married a few times
answers.value: the ones that have been married a few times

answers.text: the ones that have been divorced
answers.value: the ones that have been divorced

response.correct: the ones that have been married a few times
response.info: This quote is from the episode "Enigma". Almost everyone has questions about Gibbs' hobby of boat building. The most common question seems to be, "How did he get that thing out of his basement?"

questions.text: Kate: (referring to Gibbs) "Why is he carrying two cups of coffee today?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Good Samaritan". Gibbs is very predictable. When he has one cup of coffee, things are as good as they're going to get. When he has no coffee or two cups of coffee, it's gonna be a bad day.

questions.text: Tony: (to Gibbs) "40-mile zone ended 2 miles back, Boss. Limit's 65... I only mention it because you usually drive slightly faster than _______________."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Truth is Out There". Gibbs is typically a fast driver, so the fact that he's driving slow means he's up to something.

questions.text: Kate: "Never put anything on videotape that you don't want to be seen."
Tony: "What is it with ________ and the alphabet thing? You know, BMW, BMG, BASF, and they're all B's."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Left For Dead". Tony should consider himself lucky that this comment only got him a verbal response from Gibbs. On most days it would have gotten him a smack on the back of the head.

questions.text: Tony: "I am a man of action, Kate."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Marine Down". This quote is one of the best lines Kate had on the show. It actually left DiNozzo momentarily speechless.

info.description: Ready to try another "NCIS" quiz? This one was suggested by a fellow quizzer. Good luck!
info.name: "NCIS": Ducky-ism Season 1 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Gerald: "You shoved a French cop over a cliff"?

response.info: This is from the episode "Seadog". Gerald is skeptical to believe that Ducky have the nerve to push a cop off a cliff.

questions.text: Abby: "Please don't call me Abigail"!

response.info: This is from the episode "The Curse". Abby hates being called 'Abigail' just as bad as Jethro hates being called 'Sir'.

questions.text: Ducky: "You know post mortem details can be extremely revealing. Remember that case four years ago, where the young Marine was buried in an ________ up to his neck"?
Ducky: "I don't see Chanel Number Five".

response.info: This is from the episode "Minimum Security". Abby is trying to find the name of a perfume that was evidence from a crime scene. To do so, she purchased the top selling perfumes, hoping one would be a match. Ducky notices that Chanel No 5 was not among the top sellers.

questions.text: Regarding a dead body:

response.info: By the way, the guy in the body bag was dead. A crab managed to find its way into the body bag when the team moved the body off of the beach.

questions.text: Ducky: "I'll tell you what, Gibbs. You find me a ________ in that leg, and I'll estimate you a time of death".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "My Other Left Foot". In this episode, the team finds the lower leg of a Marine in a dumpster. As usual, Gibbs asks for a time of death from Ducky. The above quote is Ducky's response. The liver is the organ of choice for taking an internal body temperature, and therefore determining a time of death.

questions.text: Gibbs: "Couldn't sleep, huh"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Weak Link". We often head DiNozzo complaining about his neighbors, but this is the first time we ever hear Ducky complain about his.

questions.text: Abby: "It's not like they have any new ideas. It's just so..."
Who is Ducky referring to when he says: "I can't wait to weigh your liver".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Bete Noire". Ducky tells this to Ari while he is holding them hostage in the autopsy lab.

questions.text: Ducky: "I don't suppose any of you thought to take a ______ before you ran screaming from the cabin".

response.info: In the mean time, Ducky arrives on the scene and mentions this quote. Kate told Ducky that she didn't think Jethro really saw a bomb. Right after she said that, the cabin blew up.

info.description: I'm back! More Ducky-isms! Try your hand at this quiz!
info.name: "NCIS" Ducky-isms Season 2 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Ducky: "Well, now that you mention it, I did have a great uncle who drowned in a vat of alcohol."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "See No Evil". As usual, Ducky has a story for every situation. In this particular one, poor McGee has no idea how to react.

questions.text: Ducky: (Talking to the poodle's body) "Ahh, when you walked into a room I bet you must have turned heads. Just back from the ______, with your hair all done up."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Terminal Leave". In this episode, the car of a service woman is blown up. The good news is that the owner was not in the car at the time of the explosion. The bad news is that the owner's poodle was in the car when it blew up.

questions.text: Jimmy: "Did you ever meet any of special agent Gibbs' wives"?
Ducky: "Has ___________ been effective for you"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "An Eye For An Eye". Like a kid being sent to time out, Tony is always being punished for something.

questions.text: Gibbs: "They're holding Petty Officer Dobbs' body for you at the morgue."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Hometown Hero". Did you know that David McCallum, the actor that plays Ducky is 76 years old? He doesn't look it does he?

questions.text: Ducky: "Where do you think you're going?"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "SWAK". After the squad room is contaminated with the plague bacteria, the team takes refuge in autopsy. The autopsy lab, as well as Abby's lab, can be sealed via negative pressure in case of some type of biological toxin exposure.

questions.text: Ducky: "There was a time when every woman of breeding was taught _________. My mother still tries but her hand shakes. So even I have trouble reading her missives."

response.info: This quote is from the episode "SWAK". The letter that was addressed to NCIS that contained the plague bacteria was written in calligraphy.

questions.text: Gibbs: (About Tony) "How's he doing Ducky?"
Ducky: "________ soreness?"

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "Twilight". The muscle soreness that Tony was experiencing was from a combination of the plague and the car explosion at the beginning of the episode.

questions.text: Ducky: "DNA doesn't lie, Jethro. _______ do"

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Vanished". Ducky has also been to known to say that they only people who don't lie are the dead.

info.description: Did you like my first Abby-isms quiz? Take this quiz to hear even more great quotes from the most adorable forensic scientist ever! Hint: All of these quotes are from season 1.
info.name: "NCIS": "Abby-isms" Part 2 Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: Regarding a man found in an aircraft's wing tank:

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Curse". The tank that the sailor was found in fell off of a Tomcat. Kate gets a laugh when the team tells her about the acronym TFOA, short for things falling off aircraft. Kate gets an even bigger laugh when they tell her that TFOA is a real military acronym.

questions.text: Abby: "His last meal was a _________ and fries".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Sub Rosa". In this episode, a sailor was found in a tub of acid. The acid had eaten away most of the sailor, but there was enough left of his stomach contents for Abby to analyze.

questions.text: Abby: "__________ is the most powerful accessory a woman can wear".
Abby: "I suppose you want me to tell you what ______

response.info: This Abby quote is from the episode "Left for Dead". In this episode, a woman with amnesia wakes up in a shallow grave. She only remembers that there is a bomb somewhere on a Navy ship.

questions.text: Gibbs: "You still in touch with that old ______ boyfriend"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Eye Spy". Gibbs needs the help of Abby's old boy toy in this episode. This old boy toy, named Ashton, is able to access one of NASA's satellite systems and find which person in the CIA saw the murder.

questions.text: Abby: "I like that commercial where the guy puts Super Glue in his hardhat then glued his head to the beam and hung there. I tried that with my little brother".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "My Other Left Foot". The quote seems from the topic of superglue. Ducky and Abby were discussing how superglue in gaseous form will bond to latent fingerprints on human flesh.

questions.text: Gibbs: "All we've got is a tattooed leg, a sock and a boot".

response.info: This quote is also from the episode "My Other Left Foot". The botanical evidence in question was a seed from a sycamore tree. As it turns out, there was a sycamore tree in the front yard of the suspect's house.

questions.text: Tony: "Gibbs gets Dress Blue Charlies, I look like one of the Village People".
Abby: (talking to Ducky) "Wow, did you wake up on the wrong side of ______ table"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Bete Noire". Ducky sounds grumpy because he and Gerald are being held hostage in autopsy by Ari.

questions.text: Gibbs: "We gonna jump through any legal hoops"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "The Truth is Out There". In this episode, a dead marine falls through the basement ceiling of a night club.

questions.text: Abby to McGee: "Whatever you do, do not lie. Gibbs is like _____________, he knows if you've been naughty".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Dead Man Talking". This is the episode where Gibbs and the team find fellow NCIS agent Chris Pacci shot and disemboweled in an elevator.

questions.text: Kate: "I think you're just suffering from the effects of your party last night".
(Abby developing an undercover ID for Tony)

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Split Decision". In this episode, Tony is going undercover as a dishonorably discharged serviceman turned arms dealer.

questions.text: Abby: "Wake him up".

response.info: This quote is from the episode "Reveille". In this particular quote, Abby and McGee are debating whether or not to wake up Gibbs, who is asleep at his desk.

questions.text: Kate: "You OK"?

response.info: This quote is from the episode "A Weak Link". Abby is often described as the happiest Goth you will ever meet. In this case, however, she was confused by a comment made by McGee.

info.description: A quiz about my favorite show, "NCIS". And since I love quotes... yeah well... :)
info.name: "NCIS" Season 6 Quotes Trivia Quiz
info.author: KajsaVi

questions.text: Langer: "Four months I've been sitting here fielding calls for DiNozzo, and I swear, they're all women."

response.info: It was indeed Michelle who answered Langer in the beginning of the first episode of the sixth season, "Last Man Standing".

questions.text: Ziva: "Looks like we found the murder weapon. Toy guitar?"

answers.text: So you play this game a lot?
answers.value: So you play this game a lot?

answers.text: So you have one of these?
answers.value: So you have one of these?

answers.text: So our killer is an axe murderer?
answers.value: So our killer is an axe murderer?

response.correct: So our killer is an axe murderer?
response.info: Oh Ziva, always ready to come with her clever comments. Most of those are because she doesn't know English perfectly.

questions.text: "Oh come on you think I'm that stupid? Look, if I was going to steal your precious cupcake I would not leave a fingerprint on your refrigerator."
Ziva: "Gibbs is very different around him."

answers.text: I'm coming. I'm going. I'm leaving.
answers.value: I'm coming. I'm going. I'm leaving.

answers.text: I'm going. I'm coming. I'm leaving.
answers.value: I'm going. I'm coming. I'm leaving.

answers.text: I'm leaving. I'm going. I'm coming.
answers.value: I'm leaving. I'm going. I'm coming.

answers.text: I'm going. I'm leaving. I'm coming.
answers.value: I'm going. I'm leaving. I'm coming.

response.correct: I'm coming. I'm going. I'm leaving.
response.info: The 'him' is Gibbs's father, Jackson Gibbs.

questions.text: "Gibbs versus Fornell. It's like Frazier-Ali or Rocky versus...everyone."

response.info: Abby says something similar like this in season 5. Fornell and Gibbs both had the same ex-wife: Diane.

questions.text: "If you want someone dead, you knock on their door, they answer, you shoot them. Easy."

response.info: Ziva, due to her Mossad training, frequently takes the physical way out of situations.

questions.text: Ziva: "Tony, you and I come from two totally different places. In my world, you grow up. Fast. You have no choice."

response.info: Ziva grew up in Israel.

questions.text: Tony rides on a horse in the episode 6x17 "South by Southwest". He's unable to control it and it's walking in a circle. What is the very funny thing he says here?
Person 1: "Hey, Gibbs wants you guys to come back."

response.info: McGee was the original probie but Ziva earns this nickname as well once she becomes an NCIS agent.

questions.text: This is probably the most popular thing Tony has ever said to Ziva:

response.info: This is in the sixth season.

info.description: This is my first "NCIS" quiz. All the questions are on Gibb's Rules that he's talked about through the series.
info.name: 10 Question Television Quiz: "NCIS": Gibbs' Rules | NCIS
info.author: GuitarLover32

questions.text: There are two rule number ones according to Gibbs. There is another number that has more than one rule. What is it?

response.info: The second one is "Never be unreachable."

questions.text: In season 7, there is an episode called "Rule Number 51."  What is rule number 51?

answers.text: Always wear gloves at a crime scene
answers.value: Always wear gloves at a crime scene

answers.text: It's better to seek forgiveness than ask permission
answers.value: It's better to seek forgiveness than ask permission

response.info: "Your case, your lead" is rule number 38.

questions.text: "Always watch the watchers." Is this rule number 18?
What is rule number 39?

answers.text: If it seems someone is out to get you, they are.
answers.value: If it seems someone is out to get you, they are.

answers.text: There's no such thing as coincidence.
answers.value: There's no such thing as coincidence.

answers.text: Never, ever bother Gibbs in interrogation.
answers.value: Never, ever bother Gibbs in interrogation.

response.correct: There's no such thing as coincidence.
response.info: Rule number 15 is "Always work as a team.

questions.text: "If someone thinks they have the upper hand, break it!" What rule is this?

response.info: Rule number 27 is "Two ways to follow: First way, they never notice you. Second way, they only notice you." Rule number 14 doesn't exist.

questions.text: "Never go anywhere without a knife." Is that rule number 9?

response.info: Gibbs mentions this one many times. Once it saved Ducky and Palmer's lives when they were kidnapped. They carved a number 9 into a desk or shelf and when Gibbs got there, he knew that they meant rule number 9.

questions.text: What is rule number 8?

answers.text: Always be specific when you lie
answers.value: Always be specific when you lie

response.info: "Never date a coworker" is rule number 12. "You don't waste good" is rule number 5.

questions.text: What is rule number 10?

answers.text: Never get personally involved on a case
answers.value: Never get personally involved on a case

answers.text: When the job is done, walk away
answers.value: When the job is done, walk away

answers.text: First thing's first, hide the women and children
answers.value: First thing's first, hide the women and children

response.correct: Never get personally involved on a case

questions.text: What rules are for emergency use only according to Abby?

response.info: This was mentioned by Abby and was eventually confirmed by Gibbs.

questions.text: According to rule number 6, why should we never apologize?

answers.text: It means admitting you were wrong
answers.value: It means admitting you were wrong

answers.text: It means showing you're not always right
answers.value: It means showing you're not always right

response.info: "Never apologize. It's a sign of weakness" This was first established as rule number 6 in the season 7 episode "Flesh and Blood".

info.description: This quiz is all about Ziva's errors in the English language. Good luck!
info.name: "NCIS": Ziva-isms Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: We Americans refer to an impossible task as "like trying to find a needle in a haystack." According to Ziva, what are you looking for in that haystack?

response.info: This Ziva-ism is from the episode "Ravenous". She is describing the odds of finding a trained outdoorsman in all of the state park. After Tony corrects her, she argues that a pin would be equally hard to find in a haystack.

questions.text: In the states, we call someone who repeats themselves a "broken record". What does Ziva call this type of person?

answers.text: a broken record (she got this one right)
answers.value: a broken record (she got this one right)

response.info: She calls Gibbs a broken tape in "Kill Ari Part 2". Tony quickly corrects her saying "broken record".

questions.text: When our cell phones have no service, the phone is "barless". What does Ziva say about her phone when she and Tony were locked in the shipping container?

After Gibbs corrects McGee's initial assumptions about a crime scene, Ziva tries to tell McGee that his crime scene skills are getting a bit rusty. Instead of calling his skills rusty, what does she call them?

response.info: The investigation in "Agent Afloat" was one of the first crime scenes McGee has gotten to work since being back on Gibbs' team.

questions.text: To us, two gangs fighting over their territory is called a turf war. What type of war did Ziva call it?

response.info: This Ziva-ism is from the season 6 episode "Deliverance" and, as usual, Tony corrects her. In this episode, Tony and Ziva investigate 2 rival gangs after a former gang member turned marine is murdered.

questions.text: When someone is in deep trouble, we say that "their goose is cooked". What did Ziva tell Tony when he was late to work?

response.info: Ziva says this to Tony in the season 5 episode "Stakeout". He, of course, corrects her. She then proceeds to call him an idiot.

questions.text: Things that rarely happen occur "once in a blue moon". What was Ziva's version of this expression?

answers.text: once in a blue suede shoe
answers.value: once in a blue suede shoe

response.info: During the season 5 episode "Internal Affairs", FBI Agent Fornell asks Ziva how often she is misunderstood. Her reply is "once in a blue lagoon". Fornell decides he'll be able to translate.

questions.text: A task that is incredibly easy is said to be like "shooting fish in a barrel". According to Ziva, where are the fish shot?
When someone can't see the obvious, they "can't see the forest for the trees". What is Ziva's version of this idiom?

answers.text: can't see the lawn for the grass
answers.value: can't see the lawn for the grass

answers.text: can't see the jungle through the ferns
answers.value: can't see the jungle through the ferns

answers.text: can't see the forest through the brush
answers.value: can't see the forest through the brush

answers.text: can't see the jungle through the vines
answers.value: can't see the jungle through the vines

response.correct: can't see the jungle through the ferns
response.info: During the season 3 episode "Deception", Abby is trying to find an icon on a laptop. McGee points out that she's staring right at it. Ziva tries to console hr by saying, "Some times it's hard to see the jungle through the ferns".

questions.text: I know you've heard "if the shoe fits". What was Ziva's version?

response.info: This one's from the season 3 episode "Head Case". For once, it's not Tony that corrects Ziva. This time it was McGee!

info.description: The season 7 premiere of "NCIS" makes clever use of flashbacks to tell the story of the months between where season 6 left off and the following season begins.  Does the team get Ziva back?
info.name: "NCIS": "Truth or Consequences" Quiz
info.author: NatalieW

questions.text: Tony, who has been injected with truth serum by his captor, reluctantly describes the set-up and members of the NCIS team.  Which of the following phrases does he NOT use to describe McGee?

response.info: Tony does his best to fight the effects of the truth serum, but it wins out in the end, and over the course of the episode he says a number of things (both poignant and hilarious) that I'm sure he probably would not have said out loud otherwise!  Tony describes Gibbs as being (among other things) a "functional mute" and Abby as the "happiest Goth you'll ever meet".

questions.text: Tony's captor Saleem attempts to make conversation by revealing that he obtained his B.S. from which American university?

response.info: Tony replies by saying that he got his B.S. on the street (something tells me he wasn't referring to a Bachelor of Science, though!).  He then goes on to taunt Saleem by telling him that Yale has a lousy football team.

questions.text: In one of the flashback sequences, Tony and McGee emerge from the elevator at NCIS headquarters with McGee protesting that he is not Tony's what?
Gibbs gives Tony and McGee permission to interview potential candidates to fill Ziva's now-vacant position.  What flippant nickname does Tony use for the first interviewee we see him dismiss?

response.info: Pants-suit girl must have done something right, as we see Tony mouth an impressed "Wow!" as she leaves!  The next candidate, Claire Connell, gets a tick of approval from Tony and McGee, who declare that she's "unflappable" - until she meets Gibbs, who apparently reduces her to tears in an off-camera conversation.

questions.text: While in the observation room with Becky Hastings, what television show does Tony declare isn't his "cup of tea"?

response.info: Tony and Becky are watching McGee interview ("interrogation" has a "negative association", according to Tony) a drug victim, who insists that he doesn't take drugs and that someone must have slipped the drugs to him in his orange juice, because he saw something similar on "90210".  Tony turns to Becky and comments that he never really got into the show, as it wasn't his "cup of tea".

questions.text: Realising that Tony is paying him not an ounce of attention, McGee tries to snap him out of it by announcing that he's considering buying what item of clothing?

answers.text: White fedora with an ostrich feather plume
answers.value: White fedora with an ostrich feather plume

response.info: "Something that really cradles my butt".  One of the all-time greatest McGee lines!  Tony is distracted enough that it passes right over his head - he's too busy worrying about what might have happened to Ziva and why she hasn't been in touch with anyone.  McGee is worried as well, and together they decide to start looking into what may have happened to her.

questions.text: Concerned that they haven't heard from Ziva in months, Tony and McGee go to Abby for help.  Abby is also worried that Ziva hasn't got in touch, and says she's been trying to contact her on several different levels.  What levels does Tony jokingly suggest she may have used?

response.info: Abby does not find Tony the slightest bit funny - she tells him not to make jokes, and that Ziva being "universally absent" is freaking her out.  The three of them decide that since no-one is telling them anything, they'll need to start their own investigation, at which point they realise that they have two options (both illegal): hack into Mossad, or hack into Vance's computer.

questions.text: After doing some digging, Abby tells Tony that she and McGee have discovered that Ziva was a passenger on a Jordanian freighter ship.  What was the ship's name?

Determined that the person they believe to be responsible for Ziva's apparent death will be punished, Tony, McGee and Abby try to track his location.  They end up doing so by tracing his importation of what product?

response.info: Tony in particular does not take the news of Ziva's death well, seemingly going through the motions at work until he realises that they have an obligation to stop Saleem and make sure that no-one else dies.  They locate him by tracking the supply routes he uses to import provisions and other necessary items.  One item in particular stands out - something not available in Africa, something that Saleem had to import especially from the United States - Abby's beverage of choice, Caf-Pow.

questions.text: Surprisingly reunited with Ziva in Somalia, Tony and McGee try to make their escape from captivity.  Desperately trying to distract Saleem to buy them more time, Tony tells him that there's something he hasn't told him - he's described everyone on the NCIS team except himself.  How does he describe himself?

response.info: He buys them just enough time for the escape plan to be put in motion: Gibbs takes out Saleem with a sniper shot and they manage to make their escape.  The last shot of the episode is of a very tentative-looking Ziva getting a "welcome home" hug from Abby.

info.description: Remember this one? McGee's seems to be up a particular creek without a paddle after killing an undercover cop. Remember the details?
info.name: "NCIS" Episode: "Probie" Trivia Quiz

questions.text: At the very beginning of the episode, what was the topic of the conversation that Ziva and Tony were having?

response.info: Apparently Tony sold his sperm for money while in college. 14 years later, he gets a letter in the mail from the donation clinic asking to speak with him as soon as possible. Tony acts anxious about not knowing why they need to speak to him.

questions.text: Abby identifies the dead man using his fingerprints. The team learns that the man was an undercover cop. Which organization did the man work for?

response.info: The man McGee killed was a detective working undercover for the Metro Police. The team was initially unable to identify the man by his driver's license because it was a fake. After discovering the ID was fake, they turned to using his fingerprints. Because he was a cop, his fingerprints were in the AFIS database.

questions.text: Gibbs sends Tony and Ziva to, again, try to find the bullet that the dead cop supposedly fired at McGee. During the process, Tony seems to get aggravated with Ziva. Why is he upset with her?

response.info: Tony seemed upset because he felt that Ziva should be working harder to help prove McGee's innocence. She felt that looking for the bullet again was a waste of time. She also questioned Tony as to whether or not he always blindly follows Gibbs' orders. Of course he does! Imagine the head slaps he'd get if he didn't.

While on the phone with the sperm bank, how does DiNozzo spell his name for the woman on the phone?

answers.text: Big D, little I, Big N, little ozzo

By the way, we later found out that the reason the sperm bank wanted to talk to him was that no one wanted his sperm. Poor Tony, I bet that was a blow to the ego.

info.description: This "NCIS" episode gives us a glimpse into the personal life of Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs. How well do you know this episode?
info.name: "NCIS": Episode "Heartland" Trivia Quiz
info.author: TRNchick

questions.text: What is the name of Jethro's hometown?

response.info: Gibbs is from the small town of Still Water, Pennsylvania. Tony already knew this because he snooped through Gibbs' personnel file out of curiosity.

questions.text: When did Gibbs say was the last time he went home?

answers.text: since just before he joined the Marine Corps
answers.value: since just before he joined the Marine Corps

response.correct: since just before he joined the Marine Corps
response.info: When Gibbs was initially asked this question, he said that he makes it a point to go home every night. When the question was rephrased to him, he admitted not having gone home since he joined the Marine Corps.

questions.text: Jethro has not always had "rules". Who introduced him to the concept of having "rules" in which to live by?

answers.text: the commander of his sniper team
answers.value: the commander of his sniper team

questions.text: Where was Shannon the very first time that Jethro saw her?

answers.text: in the window of a dress shop
answers.value: in the window of a dress shop

response.correct: in the window of a dress shop
response.info: During a flashback, Jethro leaves his father's store quite angered. As he begins to walk down the road, he walks past a dress shop and notices Shannon in the window.

questions.text: Where was Jethro the very first time he spoke to Shannon?

response.info: Though the first time he saw Shannon she was in the window of the dress shop, he didn't actually speak to her until he sat by her at the train station.

questions.text: What is Jethro's father's first name?

response.info: His name is Jackson. He introduces himself to Ziva towards the beginning of the episode. After this initial introduction, he is typically referred to as "Jack" during the rest of the episode.

questions.text: What did Jackson Gibbs do at Shannon and Kelly's funeral that made Jethro incredibly mad?

response.info: The fact that his dad brought a date to the funeral irritated Gibbs. He seemed to be uneasy with the notion that his father had moved on with his life after the death of his mother.

questions.text: What business in the town of Still Water does Jethro's dad operate?
During the opening of this episode, three Marines are shown getting thrown out of a bar. One went back in to get something he left. What did he forget?

response.info: The sergeant went back into the bar to get his credit card. While he was inside, the other two Marines were assaulted, one fatally.

questions.text: What color was the car that Jethro's dad finished fixing up for him and gave to him at the end of the episode?

response.info: The car was black and yellow. When Jethro drove off in that car, he had the biggest smile on his face. That was probably the biggest smile we have ever seen from Jethro on "NCIS".

info.description: Here is part II of my quiz on the episode "Judgment Day." As usual, my questions are out of order.
info.name: "NCIS" - "Judgment Day," Part II Quiz
info.author: ladymacb29

questions.text: Why did Jenny stay at the diner with Franks?

answers.text: She wanted to end it there
answers.value: She wanted to end it there

answers.text: She wanted to make sure Ziva and Tony could find her
answers.value: She wanted to make sure Ziva and Tony could find her

answers.text: The car was out of gas and they had no choice
answers.value: The car was out of gas and they had no choice

response.correct: She wanted to end it there
response.info: Franks wanted to leave once they found the insurance policy, but Jenny refused because she wanted to end it there. Franks knew she was protecting someone and although she never said Gibbs' name, he knew she was protecting him.

questions.text: How many people died at the diner?

response.info: Five people died at the diner - four hitmen and Jenny. When Vance, Ziva, and Tony got on the scene, they believed there had been five shooters, one of whom got away. Which is sort of correct as Franks had fired shots and fled. Vance commented to Gibbs that Jenny had put up quite a fight.

questions.text: What calibre of bullets were in the gun Franks used?
Who accompanied the bodies back to Washington?

response.info: Vance said the bodies had been picked up the night before and he'd accompany them back to Washington for Ducky to perform the autopsies.

questions.text: Did Gibbs look at Jenny's body in Autopsy?

response.info: Ducky tried to comfort Gibbs by telling him that Jenny was dying - she would have lost motor control and it would have been painful, so perhaps this was a better way for her to have died.

questions.text: What was the name of the alias Mike Franks used to rent the car?

response.info: When McGee got the photo of the renter from the car rental place, he saw that the picture was of Mike Franks. Gibbs told McGee to delete the photo.

questions.text: Where did Gibbs meet up with Franks?

response.info: They initially met at a gas station and went to a diner to talk. When Franks told Gibbs what Jenny had told him about Paris, Franks added that classified went out the window two days prior. Gibbs told Franks to leave town because Vance was after him.

questions.text: What did McGee draw on DiNozzo's picture?
When did Gibbs run out on Vance?

answers.text: When Gibbs saw the picture of the blonde female
