questions.text: What is the title of this episode?

response.info: After finding the mummified corpse, Abby insists that there is a curse throughout the episode.

questions.text: By this time, how long had Tony been working for NCIS?

response.info: Tony mentions that his 2 year anniversary working with NCIS was coming up at the beginning of this episode.

questions.text: What was the name of the victim?
What type of plane dropped the pod the body was found in?

response.info: Lieutenant Mark Schills worked on the carrier that carried the Tomcat.

questions.text: What year was it when the victim died?

response.info: Lieutenant Mark Schills was thought to have deserted with the $2,000,000.

questions.text: What was the victim's wife's new husband's name?

response.info: Ensign Randy Wiles married Lieutenant Mark Schills' wife without her knowing they served together.

questions.text: Where is Agent Owens reassigned after the death?

response.info: Agent Owens was contacted at NCIS: Pearl Harbor towards the middle of this episode.

questions.text: What was the name of the victim's daughter?
Did Petty Officer Erin Toner win $2,000,000 in the lottery?

response.info: It was found that she had only won $37,000 instead of $2,000,000.

questions.text: What killed the victim?

response.info: Mark Schills was stabbed and then shoved into an F-14 Tomcat's drop pod.

questions.text: Who was behind the murder?

response.info: Petty Officer Ted Martinez stabbed Lieutenant Mark Schills after he gave him the money.

questions.text: What happened to the murderer?
Who killed the murderer?

response.info: Petty Officer Erin Toner killed Ted Martinez to tie up her loose ends.

questions.text: What color was the mailbag that carried the original victim's body?

response.info: Lieutenant Mark Schills was carried through the ship in an orange mailbag. This was discovered when Ducky found orange fibers on the body.

questions.text: Agent Owens joined the team at the end of this episode.

response.info: Agent Owens returned to Pearl Harbor at the end of the episode.

questions.text: What is the title of this episode?

response.info: The team is sent out to investigate a petty officer who was found naked in a freezer.

questions.text: What does Ducky ask the team to give to Agent Stan Burley?

response.info: When finding out the team was going to meet Agent Stan Burley, Ducky asks DiNozzo to give Agent Burley a cricket ball because Agent Burley was never particularly good at cricket.

questions.text: What type of ship does the team get sent out to?
What was the name of the petty officer who was found naked in a freezer?

response.info: While the two petty officers were associating with the people at the club they ask each other where Petty Officer Wilkes was and then the camera goes to Wilkes naked in the freezer.

questions.text: Where was the petty officer when he put himself into the freezer?

response.info: In the beginning of this episode the three petty officers were seen at a Mexican club. This is known by how they were speaking Spanish to the others and the Mexican chefs who found the petty officer in the freezer.

questions.text: What drug did the petty officer test positive for?

response.info: He claimed that he must have been drugged with meth without him knowing.

questions.text: How long did Agent Stan Burley work with Special Agent Gibbs?

response.info: While talking about Agent Burley, Special Agent Gibbs says that he worked with Barley for 5 years. Special Agent DiNozzo says how he is shocked that Burley still was sane.

questions.text: What color suits did the flight crew wear?
What killed the petty officer?

response.info: Ducky demonstrates how if you handle the IV bag a certain way a gas bubble is sent through the vein and death occurs within a minute.

questions.text: Who was the second person to show the symptoms?

response.info: Petty Officer Shrew started to sweat unbearably and then collapsed in the center of the runway while an incoming plane was about to land.

questions.text: What did the bottle that Chief Petty Officer Reyes gave Gibbs say on it?

response.info: While examining the pill bottle you see a close-up view of the name and it says "Alert! Caffeine Supplements".

questions.text: What did the yellow shirt say on the man in the cabin?
Who gave the petty officers the drugs?

response.info: Chief Petty Officer Reyes filled caffeine pills with meth so his team was more awake during work.

questions.text: How long did the petty officers work a day on the flight deck?

response.info: When Gibbs asked Reyes why he did it, Reyes defended himself saying that his team worked ten hours a day and he was giving them a pick me up.

questions.text: What happens to Kate during takeoff?

answers.text: she is thrown across the cabin
answers.value: she is thrown across the cabin

response.info: In the end of the episode when they are taking off, Gibbs asks if Kate is okay and there is no reply. Then Tony says, "Well, she's smiling."

questions.text: What is the title of this episode?

questions.text: What was the name of the victim?

answers.text: Petty Officer First Class Jennifer Singer
answers.value: Petty Officer First Class Jennifer Singer

response.info: Seaman Russell McDonald was found underwater with weights tied around his waist.

questions.text: What foreign skill was the victim trying to teach himself?
What color was Abby's online character?

response.info: While playing through the castle in "The Immortals", Abby's character is clearly visible as a purple figure.

questions.text: What was the victim's online character's name?

response.info: Abby discovered that McDonald was playing under the name of Weylin.

questions.text: Who was the victim's mystery friend?

response.info: After a while of searching, Kate finally deducts that McDonald's mystery friend was Zugar.

questions.text: What was the mystery friend's online character's name?

response.info: Canvarus was Weylin's arch nemesis in the game "The Immortals".

questions.text: Where did the victim and his mystery friend stage their sword fights?
What type of ship was the victim on?

response.info: In the beginning of the episode, Kate states the ship's type and class to show off her hard work.

questions.text: What was the name of the ship?

response.info: The USS Foster was stationed in the Bahamas around Puerto Rico.

questions.text: Why did the mystery friend say he told the victim to swim ashore with weights?

response.info: When questioning Zugar, Gibbs asks why he would let McDonald go through with it, Zugar replies, "To win the game."

questions.text: From his grave, who did the victim try to kill towards the end of the episode?
What did Ducky say the mystery friend's online name sounded like to him?

response.info: When explaining the whole story to Ducky, Ducky states that Canvarus reminded him of Canarus, a German Navy Admiral in WWII.

questions.text: What did DiNozzo bring Gibbs back from Puerto Rico?

response.info: Seeing as how Gibbs has never heard of MMORPGs, DiNozzo brought him a guide.

questions.text: What was missing from the bikini DiNozzo brought Kate back from Puerto Rico?

response.info: At the end of the episode, DiNozzo finally gives Kate her gift. When she opened it was a bikini excluding the top.

info.description: This episode was so good I made this quiz the day after it aired!
info.name: "NCIS" Tony's Origins Trivia Quiz
info.author: KGibbs82

questions.text: What did DiNozzo and Gibbs lose in this episode?

answers.text: Mighty Mouse stapler and coffee cup
answers.value: Mighty Mouse stapler and coffee cup

response.info: We see that Tony is more attached to his techno-gadgets and Gibbs his glasses than previously thought.

questions.text: Why did Tony turn down Gibbs' cellphone?

response.info: Tony says (after Gibbs tosses him his phone) "Wow, it's heavy." Gibbs still hasn't updated his antique phone surprise, surprise.

questions.text: What is Gibbs rule number 35?
Danny teases Tony for wearing what?

response.info: Tube socks?! You know this is something he would so razz McGeek for....Maybe there's a little McNozzo in him after all.

questions.text: What did Tony have for Gibbs' caller ID on his cellphone in the flashbacks?

response.info: He said that the name Jethro sounded a little "Beverly Hillbillies." A wonderful add-lib by Michael Weatherly.

questions.text: Complete the quote: Tony "I have a degree in physical education and played varsity basketball at Ohio State this is not going to _______!"

response.info: There is so much continuity in just this one line! Tony's major, his varsity team, and his college... and people wonder why we love this show!

questions.text: What's the first Gibbs' rule Tony learns?

response.info: Rule #5. It's a new rule to the viewers too and it's emphasized with Tony's very first HEAD SLAP! And to quote Tony from this episode, "Well, played!"

questions.text: When Tony confronts Danny about being a dirty cop he tells him to be careful I'm "_________."

answers.hint: (  6 words... not _ the _ _ _. Be sure to include "not" and "the.")

response.correct: not feeling the love right now

questions.text: Abby is talking to McGee and she says "If that's going to happen to my three musketeers I'm going to start crying right now." What's she talking about?

answers.text: If they couldn't help each other.
answers.value: If they couldn't help each other.

answers.text: If the Port-to-Port (P2P) killer got one of them.
answers.value: If the Port-to-Port (P2P) killer got one of them.

answers.text: If they grew apart and didn't speak to each other.
answers.value: If they grew apart and didn't speak to each other.

answers.text: If Vance split up the team...again.
answers.value: If Vance split up the team...again.

response.correct: If they grew apart and didn't speak to each other.
response.info: Gibbs walks in and says "No, to whatever it is." That clinches it, no crying for Abby...Gibbs says so! (You hear that P2P!) sighs... At this point season 8 isn't over and I think that's something even Gibbs can't stop... :(

questions.text: After Tony realizes Gibbs has tricked him into applying for a job at N.C.I.S. he calls him "devious", Gibbs quotes a line from what movie?

response.correct: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
response.info: Gibbs says, "Boy, I've got vision while the rest of the world wears bifocals." Tony isn't the only movie buff.
